org.jtrim.swing.access

Class ComponentDisabler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jtrim.swing.access.ComponentDisabler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccessChangeAction
    Deprecated. 
    You should rely on AutoDisplayState instead.

    Defines an AccessChangeAction which disables or enables the AWT components specified at construction time according to the availability of the associated group of rights.

    Note that ComponentDisabler does call the setEnabled method of the components in the onChangeAccess method, so the AccessManager governing the rights must be set to use an executor which submits tasks to the AWT event dispatch thread (or wrap the ComponentDisabler in an AccessChangeAction which makes sure that the onChangeAccess method does not get called on an inappropriate thread).

    Thread safety

    The onChangeAccess may only be called from the AWT event dispatch thread but other methods are safe to be accessed from multiple threads concurrently.

    Synchronization transparency

    Methods of this class are not synchronization transparent.

    @Deprecated
public final class ComponentDisabler
extends java.lang.Object
implements AccessChangeAction

    • Method Detail

      • getComponents

        public java.util.Collection<java.awt.Component> getComponents()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the AWT components whose enabled state are managed by this ComponentDisabler. That is, the components specified at construction time.
        Returns:
        the AWT components whose enabled state are managed by this ComponentDisabler. This method never returns null and the returned collection may not be modified.

      • onChangeAccess

        public void onChangeAccess(boolean available)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the enabled property of the AWT components specified at construction time to the value of the available argument.
        Specified by:
        onChangeAccess in interface AccessChangeAction
        Parameters:
        available - the value to which the enabled property of the AWT components is to be set
